Talks

Group highlights

**At the end of this page, you can find the full list of talks.

First Measurement of Coherent Elastic Neutrino Nucleus Scattering of Solar 8B Neutrinos in XENONnT

First Release of the XENONnT B8 CEvNS Result

15th International Workshop on the Identification of Dark Matter (IDM 2024, L’Aquila)

Fei Gao

Event and Slides

Accidental Coincidence Background in XENONnT for Low Energy Nuclear Recoil Search

A toughout introduction of the AC modeling methods in XENONnT. (Best Presenter Award at the Direct Detection Session)

15th International Workshop on the Identification of Dark Matter (IDM 2024, L’Aquila)

Kexin Liu

Event and Slides

液氙反应堆中微子探测器原型机的开发、运行和测试

介绍 RELICS 原型机的开发、运行和测试工作，并重点介绍近期测试的 Ar-37、Kr-83m 等低能区信号的实验特性.

第三届地下和空间粒子物理与宇宙物理前沿问题研讨会(May 2024,西昌)

赵一飞

Event and Slides

RELICS液氙反应堆中微子探测器原型机的测试进展

介绍 RELICS 原型机的开发、运行和测试工作，尤其是近期测试的 Ar-37、Kr-83m 等低能区信号特性，以及原型机单电子读出的进展和对 RELICS 低阈值探测原理的验证。

RELICS液氙反应堆中微子探测器原型机的测试进展(Aug 2024,青岛)

赵一飞

Event and Slides

First Measurement of Solar B-8 Neutrinos via Coherent Elastic Neutrino-Nucleus Scattering with XENONnT

A detailed view of the search for solar B-8 CEvNS signals in XENONnT

学术报告 (Aug 20, 2024, 高能所)

Kexin Liu

Event

First Measurement of Solar B-8 Neutrinos via Coherent Elastic Neutrino-Nucleus Scattering with XENONnT

A detailed view of the search for solar B-8 CEvNS signals in XENONnT

学术报告 (Oct 11, 2024, 中山大学)

Kexin Liu

Event

New Physics Search with Electronics Recoils from the XENONnT Experiment

A general XENONnT talk, with the latest result of lowER search.

XI International Conference on New Frontiers in Physics (ICNFP 2022)

Kexin Liu
